page.title: 16INTERVIEW WITH A FARMER
page.content: {An interview with Mr. Russell of {Church Farm, Barnsley.} We interviewed Mr. Russell about his farm and he said his farm is arable and he has 295 cattle and 40 sheep and 150 cows; all the herd are Freisans. We also asked him if he had any other livestock and he had some beef cattle, and three horses (brood mares) and 27 calves. We then asked him what sort of tractors he had and he has all Massy Fergesons.Then we asked him what sort of combine harvester he had, and he said a Massy Fergeson 755. We also asked him how many different implements he had. He has 3 ploughs, 1 seed drill, 3 fertilizer spreaders, 2 cultivators, 1 sprayer, 1 fork-lift truck, 1 slurry tanker, 1 dung spreader, 1 baler, 7 trailers, 3 rollers, 1 mower and 3 hay turners.
